text: Not that long ago , before the Chinese takeover , the news about real estate here was that the sky was the limit the highest prices in the world . So when Wong Kwan spent seventy million dollars for this house , he thought it was a great deal .
But in the past three months , stocks have plunged , interest rates have soared and the downturn all across Asia means that people are not spending here .
I think that the mood is fairly gloomy , and I think it 's not going to change for a couple of years . So for Hong Kong , it 's time , as investment bankers like to say , to reposition .
On the other hand , it 's turning out to be another very bad financial week for Asia .
The financial assistance from the World Bank and the International Monetary Fund are not helping .
